h1Banner: Meet Our Brands | Trusted Roofing & Restoration Experts
p2:
We're proud to represent a network of experienced roofing and property restoration professionals serving Central Indiana. Each local partner specializes in residential and commercial roof repair and replacement, storm damage mitigation (hail, wind, and fallen tree restoration), gutter and siding repair, and full-service insurance claim assistance. Every team in our network is licensed, insured, and committed to clear estimates, timely project completion, and lasting workmanship.

Browse below to learn about the local experts that can inspect your roof, provide a free estimate, and get repairs started quickly after storm damage or normal wear-and-tear.

brandslist.brandDescription: Central Indiana Roofing & Restoration is a locally operated roofing and storm-restoration company serving Indianapolis and surrounding communities including Carmel, Fishers, Noblesville, Greenwood, and Columbus. We specialize in shingle and metal roof repair and replacement, emergency tarping, attic and leak diagnostics, full storm-restoration projects (hail & wind), gutter and fascia replacement, and siding repair. Our process includes a free roof inspection, photo documentation for insurance claims, transparent estimates, and a project manager assigned to every job to ensure timely completion and quality control. Whether you need a simple roof patch, a full roof replacement, or assistance navigating an insurance claim after severe weather, our licensed and insured crews use industry-grade materials and proven installation techniques to protect your home or business for years to come.
